item.title: 对冲基金对市场失去信心，但做空美股除外
item.description: 对冲基金经理们在关税标题对市场造成冲击时一直按兵不动，他们仍不愿下大赌注，但有一个很大的例外：做空美股。【原文：Hedge fund managers who’ve been holding fire as tariff headlines whipsawed markets are still reluctant to place any major bets, with one big exception: shorting US stocks.】

item.title: 莫桑比克批准削减开支的 80 亿美元预算
item.description: 在大选后的动乱削弱了经济增长和财政收入之后，莫桑比克在其 2025 年预算计划中将支出比去年同期削减了 9%。【原文：Mozambique cut spending by 9% in its 2025 budget plan compared with a year earlier after post-election unrest dented growth and revenues.】

item.title: 加纳逮捕三名涉嫌走私黄金的印度国民
item.description: 加纳逮捕了三名印度人，他们涉嫌在过去十年中将黄金走私出西非国家。【原文：Ghana has arrested three Indian nationals for allegedly smuggling gold out of the West African nation for the past decade.】

item.title: 麦艾文考虑将阿根廷股票上市作为铜业部门首次公开募股的一部分
item.description: 加拿大采矿业资深人士罗布-麦克伊文（Rob McEwen）正在考虑在阿根廷上市，作为其铜矿企业首次公开募股的一部分，这是阿根廷对投资者新吸引力的最新迹象。【原文：Canadian mining industry veteran Rob McEwen is considering listing shares in Argentina as part of an initial public offering of his copper venture, the latest sign of the country’s newfound appeal for investors.】

item.title: Clara 金融科技公司融资 8000 万美元，以促进拉丁美洲的发展
item.description: 金融技术初创公司克拉拉（Clara）是一家企业支出管理公司，该公司已从投资者那里筹集了 8000 万美元的额外资金，以加强其在巴西、墨西哥和哥伦比亚的业务，并计划在年底前实现盈利。【原文：Financial technology startup Clara, a corporate spending management firm, has raised an additional $80 million in funding from investors as it seeks to bolster its operations in Brazil, Mexico and Colombia with plans to become profitable by year-end.】

item.title: 中国望远镜遭美国反对 智利陷入地缘政治困境
item.description: 中国呼吁智利批准中国在该国北部建造一座天文台，并克服美国对该项目的 "干涉 "阻挠。【原文：China called on Chile to approve the construction of a Chinese observatory in the country’s north and overcome US “interference” to block the project.】

item.title: 受关税不确定性影响，本月资金市场再度紧张
item.description: 随着四月的结束，美国融资市场的利率不断攀升，这表明支撑全球最大金融体系的管道正在出现流动性紧张。【原文：Rates in the US funding market have been climbing as April ends, flashing a sign that liquidity constraints are building in the plumbing that underlies the world’s biggest financial system.】

item.title: 晨星亿万富翁称人工智能金融模型准确性落后
item.description: 晨星公司（Morningstar Inc.晨星公司董事长乔-曼苏埃托（Joe Mansueto）说，他通过提供投资报告、研究和管理积累了财富。【原文：Financial models based on artificial intelligence are a long way from being able to compete with market research firms, said Morningstar Inc. Chairman Joe Mansueto, who built a fortune by providing investment reports, research and management.】

item.title: Meta 和联邦贸易委员会在庭审中就社交网络的定义展开争论
item.description: 作为美国联邦贸易委员会对 Meta Platforms 公司反垄断审判的一部分，来自 TikTok、X、Reddit、Pinterest 和 Discord 等主要社交媒体网络的技术高管在过去一周中出席了联邦法院的庭审。【原文：Tech executives from major social media networks like TikTok, X, Reddit, Pinterest and Discord have appeared in federal court over the past week as part of the US Federal Trade Commission’s antitrust trial against Meta Platforms Inc.】

item.title: 肯尼亚计划削减下期预算，期待国际货币基金组织（IMF）的新项目
item.description: 肯尼亚计划在截至 2026 年 6 月的一年内采取紧缩措施，以大幅缩小财政赤字，因为它正着眼于国际货币基金组织的一项新计划。【原文：Kenya plans austerity measures to significantly narrow its fiscal deficit in the year through June 2026, as it eyes a new International Monetary Fund program.】

item.title: 据说 PE 公司 CGE 正考虑以 10 亿英镑出售极光能源公司
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，CGE Partners 正在探索极光能源研究公司（Aurora Energy Research）的各种选择，包括出售这家电力和能源行业的数据和分析供应商，估值可能高达 10 亿英镑（13 亿美元）。【原文：CGE Partners is exploring options for Aurora Energy Research including a sale that could value the data and analytics provider to the power and energy industry at as much as £1 billion ($1.3 billion), people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州液化天然气厂脚手架坍塌造成三名工人死亡
item.description: 周二早些时候，Sempra 公司在得克萨斯州建造的液化天然气工厂发生脚手架坍塌事故，造成三名工人死亡，两人受伤。【原文：Three workers were killed and two were injured when a section of scaffolding collapsed early Tuesday at a liquefied natural gas plant that Sempra is building in Texas.】

item.title: 瑞士央行放宽银行获得流动性帮助的渠道
item.description: 瑞士国家银行正在改革向面临压力的银行提供流动性的方式，以回应瑞士信贷危机后对其现有框架的批评。【原文：The Swiss National Bank is reforming how it provides liquidity to banks under stress, responding to criticism of its existing framework that followed the Credit Suisse crisis.】

item.title: 中国需求强劲，ASM 订单超出预期
item.description: ASM International NV 第一季度订单超出预期，主要得益于人工智能相关细分市场对芯片制造设备的高需求以及在中国的稳健销售。【原文：ASM International NV’s first-quarter orders beat estimates, fueled by high demand for chipmaking equipment in artificial intelligence-linked segments and solid sales in China.】

item.title: Meta 推出独立人工智能应用程序，欲与 ChatGPT 竞争
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司周二发布了一款新的独立人工智能应用程序，希望与 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT 等其他流行聊天机器人展开竞争。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. released a new standalone artificial intelligence app on Tuesday in a bid to compete with other popular chatbots like OpenAI’s ChatGPT.】

item.title: 意大利银行称，特朗普推动加密货币可能引发全球风险
item.description: 意大利央行表示，如果美国对加密资产的推动最终助长了系统性风险，那么加密资产可能会给金融市场带来稳定风险。【原文：Cryptoassets could pose a stability risk to financial markets if the US push to embrace them ends up fostering systemic significance, according to the Bank of Italy.】

item.title: 英特尔称客户准备测试新生产技术
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp. ）正试图打入由台湾半导体制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Intel Corp., trying to break into an outsourced chipmaking market dominated by Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co., said prospective clients are preparing to try out its new production process.】

item.title: 斯托纳拉斯：欧洲央行应谨慎对待进一步降息
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）表示，由于全球环境不确定，欧洲央行应谨慎行事，进一步削减借贷成本。【原文：The European Central Bank should proceed carefully with additional cuts in borrowing costs due to the uncertain global environment, Governing Council Member Yannis Stournaras said.】

item.title: 波兰以美国政策风险为由下调 2025 年经济增长预期
item.description: 波兰政府以美国贸易政策和乌克兰战争等外部风险为由，下调了今年的经济增长目标。【原文：Poland’s government reduced its economic growth target for this year, citing external risks such as US trade policies and the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 据说勒索软件黑客是导致玛莎百货断电的原因
item.description: 据熟悉此次攻击的人士称，勒索软件攻击是导致马莎集团（Marks & Spencer Group Plc.）业务中断的原因，黑客利用一种强大的恶意软件锁定了这家英国零售商的部分系统，使其无法访问。【原文：A ransomware attack is the cause of a disruption at Marks & Spencer Group Plc., with hackers using a potent kind of malware to lock down some of the British retailer’s systems and render them inaccessible, according to people familiar with the attack.】

item.title: 石油资源丰富的艾伯塔省领导人在自由党赢得大选后发出挑衅之音
item.description: 在自由党连续第四次赢得加拿大大选后，艾伯塔省省长丹妮尔-史密斯（Danielle Smith）承诺将与渥太华对抗，并表示她不会允许这个石油资源丰富的省份与联邦政府之间的 "现状 "继续下去。【原文：Alberta’s Premier Danielle Smith pledged to stand up to Ottawa after the Liberal Party’s fourth consecutive election victory in Canada, saying she would not allow the “status quo” between the oil-rich province and the federal government to continue.】

item.title: 英国财政部将与美国合作制定加密货币规则，消除欧盟的担忧
item.description: 英国政府将与美国官员合作制定计划，对蓬勃发展的加密货币行业进行监管，与欧洲对唐纳德-特朗普总统拥抱该行业的担忧保持距离。【原文：The UK government will collaborate with US officials on plans to regulate the burgeoning crypto industry, distancing itself from European concerns about President Donald Trump’s embrace of the sector.】

item.title: 富国银行将根据新计划回购 400 亿美元股票
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.【原文：Wells Fargo & Co. announced a new $40 billion stock-buyback program, sending shares up.】

item.title: 火柴公司称激进分子 Anson 在董事会调整后撤回提名人选
item.description: Match Group Inc.表示，激进投资者 Anson Funds Management LP 已同意在这家约会应用公司调整董事会后撤回其董事提名，从而结束了该公司年会前一场短暂的代理权争夺战。【原文：Match Group Inc. said activist investor Anson Funds Management LP has agreed to withdraw its director nominations after a board shakeup by the dating app company, ending a short-lived proxy fight ahead of its annual meeting.】

item.title: 比特币在四月关税动荡中跑赢黄金和科技股
item.description: 比特币在四月份超越了黄金和科技股，重新引发了关于这种最大的加密货币是否可以作为市场动荡（如美国全面关税引发的纷争）的避风港的争论。【原文：Bitcoin has surged past gold and tech stocks alike in April, rekindling the debate over whether the largest cryptocurrency serves as a refuge from market turmoil such as the strife triggered by sweeping US tariffs.】

item.title: 德意志银行称客户在询问欧洲的支出计划
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）表示，即将上任的德国政府计划在基础设施和国防领域投资数千亿欧元，欧洲也在推动加快该地区资本市场的一体化进程，这些都促使客户对德意志银行的兴趣大增。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG said a plan by the incoming German government to invest hundred of billions of euros in infrastructure and defense, as well a European push to speed up integration of the region’s capital markets, are fueling a surge in client interest.】

item.title: 美国消费者信心降至近五年最低点
item.description: 受关税影响，美国消费者对经济和劳动力市场前景的悲观情绪与日俱增，4 月份美国消费者信心降至近五年来的最低点。【原文：US consumer confidence fell in April to an almost five-year low on growing pessimism about prospects for the economy and labor market due to tariffs.】

item.title: 美国职位空缺降至9月以来最低水平
item.description: 美国上个月的职位空缺降至 9 月份以来的最低点，表明在经济不确定性增加的情况下劳动力需求疲软。【原文：US job openings fell last month to the lowest since September, indicating weaker labor demand amid increased economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 阿克塞尔-施普林格彻底改革监事会，完成分拆
item.description: 在完成分拆分类广告业务的交易后，阿克塞尔-施普林格公司（Axel Springer SE）将对其监事会进行彻底改革，并任命一位新主席。【原文：Axel Springer SE will overhaul its supervisory board and appoint a new chairman following its completion of a deal to spin off its classified ads business.】
